attributes.review: i was SOOOOO excited to download this app, but when i put my gender in it said that there was only room for males so i got really pressed. not to mention the poor quality and how the app kept crashing. i was just trying to support our feminist president, but it was a really bad app✨🧚🌺
attributes.title: trump app but make it ✨terrible✨

attributes.review: Okay so i got the app because i just want him to sit in my chair ✨🧜🏿‍♀️just make it electric✨🧜🏿‍♀️ and it was running smoothly until a little after a week. My newborn baby started speaking in french then after 2 days he malfunctioned!!! This is NOT a good app and i dont recommend you to download it. Also while im here DONT VOTE FOR KANYE✌🏽😗
attributes.title: MY BABY BROKE!!!!!

attributes.review: So I was downloading the app to see what was Donald plans for elections and campaigns. Once I downloaded it just kept crashing while I was on the app so. I removed it and it keeps asking for my phone number and I am not comfortable giving out my phone number especially to a Cheeto.
attributes.title: It not a good app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it was horrible. RIGHT when I opened the app I saw the most disturbing thing. A picture of him. IT WAS ON THE SCREEN! No warnings or anything. It scared me so badly and I had to throw my phone away. This app kills. This app scares. This app hurts and tears families apart. Please don’t download this app. It will scar you forever.
attributes.title: Horrible app absolutely disgusting

attributes.review: The second i opened the app i saw a big hideous expired orange🍊😡. I initially got this app to see what our president is up too😘🤩turns out this app is meant for people with orange fetishes🤬🤬🤬 the next thing i knew i had oranges in my DM’s asking for pics of my fruit bowl😭😭 In order to stop seeing oranges I scratched my eyes out 👀 ‼️DONT BUY THIS APP UNLESS YOU ASPIRE TO BE BLIND‼️
attributes.title: This app isn’t it

attributes.review: Trump is the most uneducated and misinformed president to ever step into the white house. He does not deserve a platform to voice his “opinions”. This app only enables more people to side with Trump, in turn making more racists and sexist in America. I despise this man and everything that comes out of his mouth. This app is trash just the person it represents.
attributes.title: overthrow the orange✨🧚🏼‍♀️🍊

attributes.review: what can i say, i did not enjoy the app. i had high hopes to see our “amazing” ✨orange✨ president on this app he created, but it just was not good. i do NOT recommend you get this app but if you do and you feel the same way i do and many others do. feel free to give it a one star rating. thanks 🧚🏼‍♀️🦕✨💗🥰
attributes.title: nope 💗

attributes.review: The app has so many bugs & crashes so much. My phone kept blacking out which is not acceptable. You’d think more money would be put into actually trying to make it decent. Highly don't recommend this app to anyone. It needs to be removed.
attributes.title: Glitchy and Cheap

attributes.review: I’m sorry but i cant support someone who takes away something that allows us to express out first amendment and continues to become someone who takes away things for minorities instead of being someone that’s supposed to “make America great again”
attributes.title: No

attributes.review: i was honestly disgusted with this app and this trump fellow who my wife no longer support. i am a 68 year old vietnam vet and i do not want this man running my country! my wife is disturbed by the things she has heard this man say about women and so am i. also the app is just very unpleasant and no one should support this.
attributes.title: Disgraceful and crude
